about_the_game:
AEW: Fight Forever Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion is FREE to ALL AEW: Fight Forever players and features five new music tracks and 20 new skins! A very special thank you to the fans that made AEW the fastest growing wrestling promotion.

This content is part of Season Pass 4 which features:
  • Samoa Joe
  • Adam Copeland
  • Jay White
  • Japan Shrine Map
  • Fright Forever Haunted Forest Map
  • New Tournament Mode
  • 52 Attire and Skin Options
  • 10 new music tracks
  • 30 new moves

content_descriptors.notes: Blood could be visible in barbed wire matches and if using certain weapons. You can turn off blood effects at anytime in the options menu!
